meanings.definition: The quality of being false or counterfeit.
meanings.sent1: The spuriousnesses of the painting were revealed under close inspection.
meanings.sent2: The detective uncovered the spuriousnesses of the forged signature.
meanings.sent3: The spuriousnesses of the magician's tricks left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent4: The spuriousnesses of the politician's promises were like a house of cards.
meanings.sent5: The spuriousnesses of the diamond's authenticity were evident under the jeweler's loupe.

meanings.definition: The state of being deceitful or misleading.
meanings.sent1: The spuriousnesses of the con artist's schemes were finally exposed.
meanings.sent2: The spuriousnesses of the advertisement misled many consumers.
meanings.sent3: The spuriousnesses of the cat's innocent look hinted at mischief.
meanings.sent4: The spuriousnesses of the fog obscured the path ahead.
meanings.sent5: The spuriousnesses of the mirage in the desert played tricks on the weary traveler.
